attributes.action: Stop repossessions by banks in receipt of Government help
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banks would be forced to sell to the Government houses at a value eqivalent to the sale proceeds and costs a bank would incur should it sell the house at auction. The Government would use the property as social housing with the occupants as rent paying tenants instead of owners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
